artist: Artist: Cynthia Thompson; Publisher: Delian Press, Memphis, Tenn.
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
description: images and embossings of arms and hands in grey and vertical drapery folds in grey or tan interspersed with letterpress text; tan leather cover with two strap closures with organic metal clasps
medium: Photopolymer prints, embossing and debossing, letterpress on handmade paper; morocco cover with nickel clasps
signed: on last printed page, in pencil: [Cynthia Thompson]
title: Enfold
